name: GOAT FARM
description:
The player who keeps the platform to themself for 3 seconds earns a point. 4 points to win the game. 

Arrow keys/WASD: Movement

Z: Light Attack 

X: Heavy Attack

Enter: Start Game

Art: Chris

Music and Code: Liam

Made with DragonRuby Game Toolkit - Nokia Jam Edition

For my first video game, I bit off way more than I could chew; the game is buggy and generally just unfinished (you are fighting the bugs moreso than the enemy) but it is possible to win / lose should you ACCEPT THIS CHALLENGE.
